name: Cabin Fever (itch)
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 37 - Cabin Fever.

This jam was an opportunity for me to get familiar with Blender and creating models in a short time.

I wanted to interpret the theme as a single room story, where the environment forwards the story. I unfortunately ran out of time to add content and actions that provides further story.

The story is an exploration of loss, depression and inevitability.

W, A, S, D - Movement

Left Mouse (Hold) - Pick Up

E - Interact
